data.title: Acuson Announces Departure of Chief Financial Officer
data.meta_description: Acuson Corporation, announced the departure of Stephen T. Johnson, vice president and chief financial officer
data.text:
Acuson Corporation, announced the departure of Stephen T. Johnson, vice president and chief financial officer (CFO), effective February 20, 1998. Johnson will assume the position of CFO/vice president of finance and administration of EndoVasix Inc., an emerging medical device company.

Robert J. Gallagher, vice chairman and chief operating officer, will serve as interim CFO. Gallagher served as CFO of the company from January 1983 until January 1994.

Acuson Corporation is a manufacturer, international marketer and service provider of medical diagnostic ultrasound systems and image management products.
